Long Term Monthly Temperature in 100 Major Cities

Source: R/data.R
cities_temperature.Rd

Average temperatures between 1975 and 2010 of 100 major cities of the world. Source.

Site coordinates for this dataset are in cities_coordinates.

data(cities_temperature)

Format

data frame with 3 columns and 52100 rows.

See also

Other example_data: albatross, cities_coordinates, covid_coordinates, covid_prevalence, eemian_coordinates, eemian_pollen, fagus_coordinates, fagus_dynamics, mis, tsl_simulate(), zoo_simulate()

Examples

data("cities_temperature")

#to time series list
cities <- tsl_initialize(
  x = cities_temperature,
  id_column = "city",
  time_column = "date"
)

#time series plot
if(interactive()){

 #only four cities are shown
 tsl_plot(
  tsl = tsl_subset(
    tsl = tsl,
    names = 1:4
    ),
  guide = FALSE
  )

}
